Message.Title: DELL suks why???
Message.Msg: I just bought a desktop and called for service...It takes forever to get someone...when you get someone on the phone, she/he is from India with heavy accent.

Message.Title: dell bright future
Message.Msg: no one gives dell a break. they have a great brand that will in time prove to be a winner in the new computer age.michael dell realizes the true value of the company that he created and wants to be a part of its future. just up the bid
